orphan_notes.description: Notes with no incoming wiki links
orphan_notes.check_command: rg -l '\[\[' docs/notes/ | sort > /tmp/linked; ls docs/notes/*.md | sort > /tmp/all; comm -23 /tmp/all /tmp/linked

stale_notes.description: Notes not modified in 60+ days with sparse connections

dangling_links.description: Wiki links pointing to non-existent files
dangling_links.action: Fix or remove dangling wiki links

inbox_overflow.action: Process inbox items into docs/notes/ or tasks/
